Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.port.setap.team6c.database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
This class manages all connections with the database and is responsible for creating the database on startup

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    static interface 
    DatabaseManager.ConnectionConsumer
    A functional interface for accepting a connection, used by createConnection(ConnectionConsumer)

  • Method Details

    • createConnection

      public static void createConnection(@NotNull @NotNull DatabaseManager.ConnectionConsumer function) throws SQLException
      Creates a temporary connection to the database
      Parameters:
      function - The function to run with the connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - A SQLException will be returned if something goes wrong with the database query
